import React, { Component } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { Link } from 'react-router' import DocumentTitle from 'react-document-title' import Logo from 'shared/logo' import NotificationsContainer from 'shared/notifications' class ErrorPage extends Component { constructor (props) { super(props) this.data = { title: 'Error ' + Number(this.props.location.pathname.replace('/', '')) + ' - Enconta', errorCode: Number(this.props.location.pathname.replace('/', '')) } this.state = Object.assign({}, this.data) } errorDescription () { let description = '' switch (this.state.errorCode) { case 403: description = 'Acceso denegado' break case 404: description = 'No encontrado' break case 405: description = 'Método no permitido' break case 422: description = 'No se pudo procesar la solicitud' break case 500: description = 'Error interno del servidor' break } return description } render () { const { title, errorCode } = this.state return (

Error {errorCode}, {this.errorDescription()}.

Ir al inicio
) } } ErrorPage.propTypes = { location: PropTypes.shape({ pathname: PropTypes.string }) } export default ErrorPage
